TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A procedure that uses an endoscope to examine the inside of the body. An endoscope is a thin, tube-like instrument with a light and a lens for viewing. It may also have a tool to remove tissue to be checked under a microscope for signs of disease.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Procedimiento en el que se usa un endoscopio para examinar el interior del cuerpo. Un endoscopio es un instrumento delgado con forma de tubo, con una luz y una lente para observar.
